[[VK_KHR_variable_pointers]]
=== VK_KHR_variable_pointers

*Name String*::
    `VK_KHR_variable_pointers`
*Extension Type*::
    Device extension
*Registered Extension Number*::
    121
*Revision*::
    1
*Extension and Version Dependencies*::
  * Requires Vulkan 1.0
  * Requires `<<VK_KHR_get_physical_device_properties2>>`
  * Requires `<<VK_KHR_storage_buffer_storage_class>>`
